mods.abstract: "The Auxiliary of the Memphis and Shelby County Medical Society and the Museum have discussed the inclusion of an exhibit highlighting the historic importance of medicine and the health sciences to the Mid South region. The museum has proposed the allocation of 1,000 to 1,500 square feet of space for the exhibit and will be responsible for the maintenance..." Document includes list of topics under consideration and a diagram of the planned space.
